import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Carrousel.css' const apiURL = 'https://cats-adlb1ipvq-paulatealonso.vercel.app' const Carrousel = () => { const [cats, setCats] = useState([]) const [fetching, setFetching] = useState(true) useEffect(() => { axios .get(apiURL) .then((response) => { const catsNoKaren = response.data.cats.sort((a, b) => { return (a.price - b.price) }) setCats(catsNoKaren) setFetching(false) }) .catch(err => console.error(err)) }, []) return (
{fetching &&

LOADING...

) } export default Carrousel
